name: Cozy single room near Sants Stn
description: Excellent location: 5 mins walk from Sants station where you can get direct trains to Barcelona El Prat Airport, Ave to Madrid, etc. 2 underground lines (L3 L5).  Well connected to all the attractions: 1 stn from Pza Cataluña, 1 stn from Paseo de Gracia, 2 stns from Arco de Triunfo, 4 stns to Sagrada Familia. Barça Stadium, Camp Nou, only 15 mins walk.  The room has a small window to the inner laundry room.  Check-in 3pm to 5pm. Flexible check-in upon request
neighborhood_overview: Les Corts is a wonderful neighborhood. If you want some real Catalan life, this is the place. Very family oriented, plenty of parks and supermarkets (there are 3 just around the corner). There is also a shopping mall near by and plenty of bars and restaurants.It is a really safe neighborhood. You can enjoy a pleasant stroll any time of the day.
host_about:
Hi! We are Xiao Li and Sol (mother and daughter). We are Chinese and have lived in Argentina and now Spain. We were Airbnb guests before becoming hosts.

We love traveling and dogs. If you book our place, you will meet Marques (a friendly cocker spaniel). We speak Chinese, Spanish and English.
Look forward to meeting you!
amenities: ["High chair", "First aid kit", "Iron", "Dedicated workspace", "Body soap", "Lock on bedroom door", "Children\u2019s books and toys", "Essentials", "Hot water", "Wifi", "Breakfast", "Dishes and silverware", "Refrigerator", "Shower gel", "Luggage dropoff allowed", "Portable fans", "Clothing storage", "Hangers", "Radiant heating", "Hair dryer", "HDTV with Netflix", "Extra pillows and blankets"]
